1528234320_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: Setup pihole (https://pi-hole.net/) and host your own caching resolver locally. It'll speed up DNS for your entire network, block ads and trackers and can use multiple upstream DNS servers.

1533110363_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: How does a VPN killswitch interact with disconnections? Will all traffic permanently be dead or will the VPN be able to re-negotiate and the connection will continue?
